noun.description: A hot drink made by infusing the dried crushed leaves of the tea plant in boiling water.
The evergreen shrub or small tree that produces tea leaves, native to South and eastern Asia and grown as a major cash crop.
A light afternoon meal consisting typically of tea to drink, sandwiches, and cakes.

origin: Mid 17th century: probably via Malay from Chinese ( Min dialect) te; related to Mandarin ch√°. Compare with char.
